summary: Hroki of Markarth, as your wife and follower.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img862.imageshack.us/img862/5526/hroki297.jpg[/img]

[center]Get [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3806]Lisette Wife Companion[/url] too![/center]
[center]Get [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4001]Alva Wife Companion - Vampire[/url] too![/center]

[u]Description[/u]
This mod allows for Hroki of Markarth to be both your wife and follower companion. She can cook, start a business, follow you in your quests and do everything a follower does.

Plugin includes:
- Linwe Armor for her basic traveling armor (in combat).
- Package adjustments to allow her to do her job.
- upgraded weapons and spells.

[u]Install:[/u]
Place \"Hroki Wife Companion.esp\" in your \\Skyrim\\Data\\ folder.
Read the uploaded Readme on how to get her, even if you have a current wife.

[u]Uninstall:[/u]
Delete \"Hroki Wife Companion.esp\" 

[u]Credits:[/u]
Bethesda
me

Alter the mod as you see fit, but I will be improving it more when CK comes out.

[u]Bugs:[/u]
Please see the uploaded ReadMe for instructions you must perform. Some parts of the packages are conflicting and can not function properly without scripting upon CK\'s release in the future. If you forget to activate the mod, you won\'t get the follower dialogue. If you have problems with her follower dialogue then open console, target Hroki, type getinfaction 5C84D. If it returns a \"0\", then type addfac 5C84D 1\".

- Aoikani
author: Aoikani
